description.brief: Driver for iRobot Create and Roomba

package.description:
For ROS bindings, please see create_node.
This is a generic driver for iRobot Create and Roomba. Port of pyrobot.py by Damon Kohler. It is currently labeled as turtlebot_driver pending review by the entire create community before using the name create_driver.
package.author: Damon Kohler. Ported and maintained by Ken Conley and Melonee Wise
